reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: Is the salary as per market standard?
Tell us about your last increment
How many hours you normally work in a day?
Does Infosys BPO Ltd have a flexible working hours policy?
How often do you have parties/offsites?

answersView.AnswerTextHi: प्रबंधन इस पर विश्वास नहीं करता है

reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: How often do employees get promotions?
How many trainings do you attend every year?

answersView.AnswerText: More than 6 times in a year
answersView.AnswerTextHi: एक वर्ष में 6 बार से अधिक

detailedDescription.articleBody: Infosys BPM, the business process management subsidiary of Infosys, was set up in April 2002. Infosys BPM provides integrated outsourcing and transformation services. It is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.
detailedDescription.articleBodyHi: Infosys BPM, Infosys की व्यवसाय प्रक्रिया प्रबंधन सहायक, अप्रैल 2002 में स्थापित की गई थी, Infosys BPM एकीकृत आउटसोर्सिंग और परिवर्तन सेवाएं प्रदान करता है, इसका मुख्यालय बेंगलुरु, भारत में है,

recommendations.companyName: WILLIS PROCESSING SERVICES INDIA PVT LTD
